hold-off-time.description: Hold-off timer for section group APS(100ms).

east-switch.description: East switch command of section group APS. The east switching command is mutually exclusive to the west switching command

west-switch.description: West switch command of section group APS.The west switching command is mutually exclusive to the east switching command.

is-active.description: Active flag of section group APS.

ring-map.description:
Aps ring map  of section group APS.

1 The first member ofring map should be equal to the APS ID.

2 The middle member of ring map shouldn't be equal.

3 The second member of APS ring map should be equal to the east APS ID or the west APS ID.

4 The maximum number of APS ring map is 64.

5 The last member of APS ring map should be equal to the east APS ID or the west APS ID.

pg-index.description: APS session ID of port group.

protect-status.description:
Protect status of port group APS:
0 NO_REQUEST_NULL
1 NO_REQUEST_NORMAL
2 MANUAL_SWITCH
3 MANUAL_SWITCH_W 
4 SIGNAL_FAIL_W
5 SIGNAL_FAIL_P
6 SIGNAL_DEGR_W
7 SIGNAL_DEGR_P
8 WAIT_TO_RESTORE
9 FORCED_SWITCH
10 FORCED_SWITCH_W
11 LOCKOUT
12 EXERCISE_NULL
13 EXERCISE_NORMAL
14 NOT_READY
15 DO_NOT_REVERT
16 SIGNAL_FAIL_P with work and protection both failed
17 not finish MANUAL_SWITCH
18 not finish MANUAL_SWITCH_W
19 not finish SIGNAL_FAIL_W
20 not finish SIGNAL_FAIL_P
21 not finish SIGNAL_DEGR_W
22 not finish SIGNAL_DEGR_P
23 not finish FORCED_SWITCH
24 not finish FORCED_SWITCH_W
25 not finish LOCKOUT
26 not finish EXERCISE_NULL
27 not finish EXERCISE_NORMAL
28 REVERSE_REQUEST_NULL
29 REVERSE_REQUEST_NORMAL

4 The maximum number of APS ring map is 64.

5 The last member of APS ring map should be equal to the east APS ID or the west APS ID.
